text: wlw taraa -ayha alrswl- hwla' almushrikin yawm alqiamat lrayt amrana ezymana, wdhlk hin yuhbaswn ealaa alnar, wayushahidun ma fiha min alslasl walaghlal, wara'awua baeynhm tilk al'umur aleizam walahwal, faeind dhlk qalu: yalytna nuead 'iilaa alhayat aldnya, fnsdq biayat allah wanaemal bha, wanakun min almwmnyn
